# Vanishing Trick (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Vanishing Trick (Su):* As a swift action, the ninja can disappear for 1 round per level. This ability functions as *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]*. Using this ability uses up 1 ki point.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 16
